programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Полевой госпиталь
programme.desc: В небольшом городке у польского приграничья, где во время полномасштабного вторжения России в Украину развернули полевой госпиталь, бок о бок трудятся украинские медики, волонтёры и квалифицированные специалисты из Израиля, Польши, США и других стран. Они оставили свою мирную жизнь ради того, чтобы спасать людей, пострадавших от войны. Каждый день здесь — это сочетание тяжёлых вызовов и веры в лучшее. Среди пациентов есть и военные, мужественно защищающие Украину, и мирные жители, каждый со своей нередко основанной на реальности историей. В этом месте, среди отголосков войны, продолжается жизнь: здесь появляются на свет дети, а порой — даже возникает любовь, несмотря на все испытания.

Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson star in this riveting saga of a veteran Marine who becomes the scapegoat for a mission that went tragically wrong. Faced with murder charges in a case thats been rigged against him, Col. Terry Childers (Jackson) turns to a former brother-in-arms (Jones) to defend him and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Berkeley
programme.desc: Berkeley is the story of Ben Sweet, an eighteen year old boy who comes to UC Berkeley in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There begins an odyssey through sex, drugs, rock and roll, and political activism which turns his world upside down and leaves him on a path of exploration and self-discovery, far from the life of his father, Sy Sweet. The film depicts a group of young people protesting the Vietnam War.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia, an Italian actress and Director in her seventies, decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood days. She gets to Humberstone, a mining town located in the desert of Northern Chile, with the aim to fulfill her utopia: to establish a small TV channel and bring the "magic box" where television has never been seen before, just like the main character in "Fitzcarraldo" by Werner Herzog, who wished to bring the Opera by Caruso to the Amazonian jungle.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Wings Of Eagles
programme.desc: The continuing true story of Eric Liddells glorious life after winning Olympic gold in the 1924 Paris Olympics. Liddell has returned to China, where he was born to missionary parents, modestly avoiding celebrity in order to teach local schoolchildren. In 1937, the Japanese invade China at the outset of WWll. Liddell with his friend Xu Niu, a street smart resistance fighter, recognize the increasing danger so Liddell sends his wife, Florence and their two daughters to safety in Canada. Duty-bound, Liddell stays to minister to the civilian victims. Liddell and other foreign nationals are taken as prisoners and placed in one of the many Japanese internment camps where they are forced to endure for two years. Before the Japanese surrender, Liddell succumbs to a brain tumor. Yet his message of hope became immortal. Eric Liddells legacy continues to this day as he remains admired as a champion for life.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: From the Shadows
programme.desc: Terri has a great life, a great boyfriend and she just won the lottery! Then she awakens to find herself in a dungeon being tortured by an insane doctor obsessed with his new date rape drug, in search of her winning lottery ticket. The horror she encounters is not only in front of her, but in the darkest recesses of her mind.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941 China under the Japanese rule, Ma Yuan is forced to work in railroad construction used for transferring Japanese equipment. He decides together with a team of rebels to sabotage a military train with heavy weaponry.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: The Good Girl
programme.desc: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.Justine is a sullen 30-year-old woman stuck in a dead-end job at the Retail Rodeo department store.In addition to her mind-numbing occupation, Justine also has to contend with her dim-witted husband, Phil, and his partner, Bubba, who work as house painters when they arent smoking pot and staring blankly at the television.Justine sees an opportunity for change, however, when she meets Holden, a fellow Retail Rodeo employee who is even more depressed than herself.The young Holden and Justine soon begin a passionate secret affair, unaware that it may not be so secret after all.

programme.title: Apokalipto
programme.desc: Maiju valstībai piedzīvojot tās norietu, jauns vīrietis dodas bīstamā ceļojumā uz pasauli, kurā valda bailes un apspiešana.

programme.title: Ultraamerikāņi
programme.desc: Maiks strādā benzīna uzpildes stacijā un samērā bezmērķīgi pavada savu dzīvi, veltīdams daudz laika zālītes pīpēšanai kopā ar savu draudzeni Fību. Taču negaidīti atklājas, ka Maiks ir īpaši trenēts un ļoti nāvējošs slepenais aģents. Līdz šim nemaz nenojautis par saviem neparastajiem talantiem, Maiks tiek ierauts bīstamā valdības specdienestu spēlē, kurā jaunizceptajam varonim ir jāpieliek visi pūliņi, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Ziemeļu meža ceļš.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Apokalipto
programme.desc: Maiju valstībai piedzīvojot tās norietu, jauns vīrietis dodas bīstamā ceļojumā uz pasauli, kurā valda bailes un apspiešana.

programme.title: 127 Stundas
programme.desc: Filma "127 stundas" balstīta uz patiesiem notikumiem par alpīnistu Āronu Ralstonu, kuru filmā spēlē aktieris Džeimss Franko. Stāsts risinās pēc negadījuma Jūtas štata kanjonos, kad Āronu klinšu aizā iesprosto klintsbluķis, piespiežot viņa roku pret akmens sienu. Turpmākās piecas dienas jeb 127 stundas alpīnists cīnās par dzīvību un ir spiests pieņemt izmisīgu, taču drosmīgu lēmumu, nozāģējot savu roku, kas ir viņa vienīgā iespēja palikt dzīvam.

programme.title: Ultraamerikāņi
programme.desc: Maiks strādā benzīna uzpildes stacijā un samērā bezmērķīgi pavada savu dzīvi, veltīdams daudz laika zālītes pīpēšanai kopā ar savu draudzeni Fību. Līdz šim nemaz nenojautis par saviem neparastajiem talantiem, Maiks tiek ierauts bīstamā valdības specdienestu spēlē, kurā jaunizceptajam varonim ir jāpieliek visi pūliņi, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.desc: Maiju valstībai piedzīvojot tās norietu, jauns vīrietis dodas bīstamā ceļojumā uz pasauli, kurā valda bailes un apspiešana.

programme.title: 127 Stundas
programme.desc: Filma "127 stundas" balstīta uz patiesiem notikumiem par alpīnistu Āronu Ralstonu, kuru filmā spēlē aktieris Džeimss Franko. Stāsts risinās pēc negadījuma Jūtas štata kanjonos, kad Āronu klinšu aizā iesprosto klintsbluķis, piespiežot viņa roku pret akmens sienu. programme.title: Seifs
programme.desc: Madride, Spānija, 2010. Kamēr visa pilsēta seko līdzi valstsvienības veiksmīgai dalībai Pasaules kausa izcīņā, pārdrošu zagļu grupa meklē ceļu uz vienu no visdrošākajām un vislabāk apsargātajām vietām uz planētas.

programme.title: Ostins Pauerss, spiegs, kurš mani iz..
programme.desc: Ostins Pauers ir visstilīgākais, visnekaunīgākais un visnevaldāmākais no visiem slepenajiem aģentiem! Taču viss viņa šarms var izzust vienā mirklī, jo Pauera lielākais ienaidnieks doktors Ļaunums ar laika mašīnas palīdzību nodomājis atgriezties 1960. gados un nolaupīt Pauera modžo, kas padara ar seksu apsēsto spiegu pievilcīgu pretējā dzimuma acīs!

programme.title: Ananasu ekspresis
programme.desc: Deils ir slaists, kurš laiku pa regulāri iegriežas pie Saula - sava narkotiku dīlera. Viņiem nav nekā kopīga, izņemot interesi par jaunām zālītes šķirnēm. Kad Deils kļūst par slepkavības liecinieku un notikuma vietā pamet aizsmēķētu kāsi, viņam uz pēdām nonāk sliktie puiši, un nu briesmās ir arī Sauls. Abi ņem kājas pār pleciem, un, bezmērķīgi bēguļojot, iekuļas vienās vienīgās nepatikšanās.

programme.title: Seifs
programme.desc: Madride, Spānija, 2010. Kamēr visa pilsēta seko līdzi valstsvienības veiksmīgai dalībai Pasaules kausa izcīņā, pārdrošu zagļu grupa meklē ceļu uz vienu no visdrošākajām un vislabāk apsargātajām vietām uz planētas.

programme.title: Non-Stop: tiešais reiss
programme.desc: Transatlantiskā avioreisa Ņujorka_Londona laikā ASV aviācijas policijas priekšnieks Bils Marks saņem vairākas īsziņas ar prasību pārskaitīt 150 miljonus dolāru uz kādu ārzonu kontu. Pretējā gadījumā tiek draudēts ik pēc 20 minūtēm nogalināt kādu pasažieri. Kad atklājas, ka konts ir atvērts uz paša Marka vārda, viņš tiek turēts aizdomās par lidmašīnas nolaupīšanu.

programme.title: Bez nožēlas
programme.desc: Elitārs jūras kājinieks dodas ceļā, lai atriebtu savas sievas slepkavību, nonākot aizvien lielākās sazvērestībās.

programme.title: Algotnis
programme.desc: 23 gadīgais Mičs zaudējis savu līgavu teroristu uzbrukumā ir apsēsts ar atriebību. Viņš uzsāk apmācības specvienības rotā, lai atrastu un nogalinātu tos, kuri ir atbildīgi par viņas līgavas slepkavību. Par viņa instruktoru tiek nozīmēts Aukstā kara veterāns, ar kuru kopā viņi izmeklēs it kā savstarpēji nesaistītus teroristu uzbrukumus. Izmeklēšana viņus aizvedīs uz pēdām izbijušam CIP aģentam, kurš ir apmāts ar kara uzsākšanu Tuvajos austrumos.

programme.title: Visa pasaules nauda
programme.desc: Kad sešpadsmitgadīgais Džons Pols Getijs III tiek nolaupīts, viņa izmisusī māte Geila lūdz jaunekļa vectēvu, naftas magnātu, samaksāt izpirkumu. Kad miljardieris Getijs atsakās, Geila visiem spēkiem mēģina viņu pārliecināt, jo dēla nolaupītāji kļūst arvien brutālāki. Kamēr zēna dzīvība karājas mata galā, negaidīti par Geilas sabiedroto šajā cīņā kļūst Getija konsultants Flečers Čeiss, bijušais CIP darbinieks.

programme.title: Puisis
programme.desc: Jauns žurnālists Gotjērs uzzinājis, ka viņš ir franču popdziedātāja Gaja Džemeta ārlaulības dēls. Kamēr veco laiku zvaigzne dodas tūrē, lai reklamētu savu jauno albumu, Gotjērs nolemj sekot viņam aizkulisēs, uz skatuves un ceļā. Viņa iegansts - viņš it kā filmē dokumentālo filmu par mūziķa karjeru.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?

programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Neticamais stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu
programme.desc: Trīspadsmit "Oskariem" nominētās filmas pamatā ir F. Skota Ficdžeralda stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu, kurš piedzimis sirmā vecumā un ar katru gadu paliek aizvien jaunāks. Viņam svarīgie cilvēki, sekojot dabiskajam ritmam, noveco un mirst, bet Bendžamins kļūst arvien jaunāks un jaunāks. Neparastie notikumi aizsākas Pirmā pasaules kara beigās, Ņūorleānā un sniedzas līdz 21. gadsimtam. Galvenajās lomās: Breds Pits, Tilda Svintone, Keita Blanšeta u.c.

programme.title: Mērija un Makss
programme.desc: 1976. gadā Melburnā vientuļa astoņgadīga meitene uzsāk saraksti ar neparastu vēstuļu draugu - smagi aptaukojušos 44 gadus vecu ņujorkieti ar Aspergera sindromu.

programme.title: Maigās jūtas
programme.desc: Galvenās varones Natālijas laimīgā dzīve acumirklī sabrūk - viņas vīrs iet bojā zem automašīnas riteņiem. Lai remdētu sirdssāpes, viņa pilnībā nododas darbam un ātri vien paceļas pa karjeras kāpnēm. Kādu dienu viņas kabinetā ierodas neizteiksmīgs, pieticīgs kolēģis vārdā Markuss, kuram neviens nekad nav pievērsis uzmanību. Iegrimusi domās, neizskaidrojama impulsa pārņemta, Natālija viņu noskūpsta. Kopš šīs dienas divu vientuļu siržu dzīve krasi mainās.

programme.title: Ofēlija
programme.desc: Filmā "Ofēlija", kas veidota pēc Lisas Klainas romāna, Ofēlija, slavenā Šekspīra lugas "Hamlets" varone, vēsta savu versiju par to, kā patiesībā risinājās lugā aprakstītie notikumi. Ofēliju, dumpīgo, bez mātes augušo meiteni, pieņem audzināšanā karaliene Ģertrūde. Viņā iemīlas Ģertrūdes dēls princis Hamlets, un viņi slepus apprecas laikā, kad Dānijas karaļvalsti apdraud norvēģu iebrukums un galma iekšienē vērptās intrigas. Ofēlijai un Hamletam ir jāizvēlas starp mīlestību un atriebības alkām.

programme.title: Meitene grāmatā
programme.desc: Stāstā, kas uzņemts Ņujorkas izdevniecības vidē, jauna grāmatu redaktore ir spiesta konfrontēt ar kādu nodaļu nosavas pagātnes - labi pārdotu grāmatu autors no jauna ieradies viņas dzīvē.

programme.title: Omārs
programme.desc: Netālā distopiskā nākotnē, saskaņā ar pilsētas likumiem, cilvēki bez otrās puses tiek aizvesti uz viesnīcu, kur viņi ir spiesti 45 dienu laikā atrast romantisku partneri. Citādi viņi tiek pārvērsti par nezvēriem un nosūtīti uz mežu.

programme.title: Ofēlija

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Hosts Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome ten chefs to the Tuscan villa where they will live, cook and prove their skills with Italian cuisine.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jos Faves. Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyere Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Mexican Cuisine. Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Lobster Rolls. Inspired by her honeymoon in Maine, Joanna makes lobster rolls, hush puppies, wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and cherries jubilee.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Italian Eats. Joanna makes an Italian meal including pink baked ziti, roasted garlic parmesan toast and antipasto salad with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon starts the day off with breakfast in the garden. He puts a twist on French toast, perfects the omelette and serves a summery drink.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon explores the delicious world of sweet and salty flavours with a crispy sandwich, stuffed dates, kicked-up popcorn and a fruity cocktail.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Hosts Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome ten chefs to the Tuscan villa where they will live, cook and prove their skills with Italian cuisine.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Shota Nakajima, a master of Japanese cuisine, brings his Michelin training and pristine technique to combat his mentors, Bobby Flays Titans.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay: Holiday Throwdown
programme.desc: Eddie Jackson kicks off the holiday season with a turkey-less Thanksgiving celebration. Chefs Christian Petroni, Adrienne Cheatham and Michael Voltaggio show Bobby Flay that the side dishes are the stars on this years dining table.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Chauhan V. Lofaso
programme.desc: The team captains cook dishes straight in the coals, and the Brawlers prepare meaty rib feasts on Argentinian asado iron crosses.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship

With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: The 10 remaining chefs are assigned famous works of art to use for inspiration as they prepare impressive plates of food for judge Fariyal Abdullahi.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: New Haven. Noah Cappe, Jet Tila and Tiffani Faison visit the top restaurants in New Haven, Connecticut. There, they sample burgers, hot honey pizza, hot chicken and empanadas.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: Atstātie
programme.desc: 1970. gada Ziemassvētki. Prestižā skolā uz svētku brīvdienām paliek visu nīstais skolotājs Pols, skolas pavāre Mērija un piecpadsmit gadus vecais Anguss. Pa šīm dienām šie tik ļoti atšķirīgie cilvēki ne tikai iemācīsies sadzīvot un saprast viens otru, bet arī mainīs viens otra dzīves uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Strops satraukti dūc – nupat novākta vasaras medus raža. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai Medus spēlēs? Maijas jaukais satraukums zūd, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju piedalīties spēlēs, pārstāvot savu stropu. Cenzdamās pierādīt stropa karalienei, ko bites spēj, Maija apsola gūt uzvaru Medus spēlēs un glābt stropa medu. Karaliene piekrīt, bet atgādina, ka, vedot komandu cīņā, Maijai vispirms jāiemācās uzklausīt citus. Maija piedalās spēlēs kopā ar labāko draugu Villiju un seno biedru vaboļu komandu. Drīz viņa sastop skaudīgo bitīti Vijolīti no Zumtropoles, kura ar viltu cenšas atņemt Maijas komandai uzvaru. Bitītei nākas piedzīvot viltus rūgtumu, taču negodīgā Vijolīte un viņas komanda arī iekuļas ķibelē.

programme.title: Strāvas karš
programme.desc: Dramatisks sāncensības stāsts par elektrības atklāšanas laikmeta titāniem Tomasu Edisonu un Džordžu Vestinghausu, lai noskaidrotu, kura izgudrotā elektriskā sistēma būs noteicošā modernizētajā pasaulē.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no Kentervila lāsta. Kad šajā savrupmājā ievācas kāda amerikāņu ģimene, spokam parādās cerību stariņš beidzot tapt atbrīvotam.

programme.title: Robotu sapņi
programme.desc: Suņa un robota piedzīvojumi un neveiksmes Ņujorkā 80.-ajos gados.

programme.title: Gudričs
programme.desc: Andija Gudriča dzīve tiek apgriezta kājām gaisā, kad viņa sieva uzsāk rehabilitācijas programmu, atstājot viņu vienu ar viņu mazajiem bērniem. Gudričs paļaujas uz Greisu, savu meitu no pirmās laulības, un galu galā kļūst par tēvu, kāds viņai nekad nav bijis.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Ir pagājuši pieci gadi, kopš Hiks un Nezobs veiksmīgi apvienoja pūķus un vikingus uz Berkas salas. Kamēr Astrīda, Snūģis un pārējie sacenšas pūķu sacīkstēs (kas ir salas iemītnieku mīļākais sporta veids), nešķiramie draugi iepazīst apkārtni, veidojot līdz šim neatklāto teritoriju karti un atklājot jaunas pasaules. Kārtējā piedzīvojuma laikā viņi atklāj slepenu ledus alu, kur mīt vairāki simti savvaļas pūķu un noslēpumainais Pūķu Jātnieks. Hiku un Nezobu ierauj kaujā par miera saglabāšanu pasaulē. Tagad viņiem jācīnās par to, kam viņi tic, un tikai kopīgiem spēkiem draugi spēs mainīt cilvēku un pūķu nākotni.

programme.title: Nezvēri
programme.desc: No dzimtenes izceļojis franču pāris Spānijas laukos vada organisko saimniecību, taču rodas nesaskaņas ar vietējiem ciemata iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Zagļu medības 2: Pantera
programme.desc: Lielais Niks atkal ir medībās – šoreiz Eiropā, un viņš jau tuvojas Donijam, kurš ir iesaistījies bīstamajā dimantu zagļu pasaulē un bēdīgi slavenajā "Panteras" mafijā. Viņi plāno grandiozu laupīšanu pasaulē lielākajā dimantu biržā.

programme.title: Ar ieročiem rokās
programme.desc: Mailzs, pieaudzis vīrietis, kura bērnības sapņi neīstenojās, vada savas dienas, izniekojot laiku pie datora un kaitinot tīmekļa troļļus ar dzēlīgiem komentāriem. Kādu dienu viņš uzzina par tīmekļa sensāciju "Skizm", kas iesaista cilvēkus spēlē uz dzīvību un nāvi. Mailzs sāk kaitināt spēles skatītājus un piesaista vietnes administratoru uzmanību. Viņi ielaužas Mailza mājā, nolaupa vīrieti un piespiež iesaistīties iznīcinošajā spēlē. Mailzam ir uzdevums – nogalināt Niksu, vienu no nežēlīgākajām "Skizm" spēlētājām. Sākas postoša, spraiga un stilīga spēle – kurš izdzīvos?

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Slepkavība Austrumu ekspresī
programme.desc: Ceļojums vienā no krāšņākajiem Eiropas vilcieniem pārvēršas vienā no sarežģītākajām un visaizraujošākajām mīklām kriminālistikas vēsturē. Savā kupejā miris tiek atrasts noslēpumainais amerikāņu miljonārs Rečets un nav šaubu, ka slepkava ir viens no pasažieriem. Kamēr puteņa dēļ vilciens ir apstājies un nošķirts no ārējās pasaules, detektīvam Eriklam Puaro ir jānoskaidro slepkava, pirms tas uzbruks atkal.

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Bestsellers
programme.desc: Untumains pensionēts rakstnieks negribīgi sāk piedalīties savas pēdējās grāmatas veicināšanas kampaņā, lai izpalīdzētu jaunai izdevējai.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: 4. jūlijā, Neatkarības dienas svētku brīvdienās, valsti apdraud uzbrukums neaizsargātajai ASV infrastruktūrai. Noslēpumainais nozieguma izplānotājs ir pārdomājis visus mūsdienu aizsardzības aspektus, bet nav rēķinājies ar vecā kaluma pretinieku Džonu Makleinu. Bez maskas. Bez apmetņa. Bez problēmām.

programme.title: UFC. Arman Tsarukyan-Dan Hooker
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: LaLiga. Espanyol - Sevilla
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Borussia - Stuttgart
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Valencia Basket - FC Bayern Munich
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Boise Boys
programme.desc: American reality series following expert renovators Clint Robertson and Luke Caldwell as they transform houses in Boise, Idaho. The pair of best friends make a formidable team, even if they have completely different personalities and outlooks, and they use their skills and experience to flip houses and make a profit. Through their company, Timber and Love, they aim to promote the use of timber in home renovations. With hugely contrasting styles, they get the job done with a little arguing and a lot of hard work, ensuring these homes look better than ever.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Home Town Takeover
programme.desc: Ben and Erin surprise the head of a local childrens charity with a home renovation. Chelsea and Cole DeBoer arrive to help with the project.

programme.title: Home Town Takeover
programme.desc: Ben and Erin renovate the home of a local family health advocate. Plus, downtown Sebrings main park gets a refresh.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab: Alisons Dream Home
programme.desc: After ten months of building, Alison is close to having a place of her own in Chicago. However, to finish the job she needs to find more money.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A town bound couple seek the adventurous outdoors that Anderson Island, Washington has to offer. They want seclusion and views of the pristine water.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A doctor decides to uproot her life and move from the Los Angeles sprawl to the ever-peaceful Amelia Island. She seeks a seriously quirky island home.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: A couple fear the house they just bought has been neglected for too long. Can Chip and Jo transform this abandoned property into their dream home?

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack McBrayer tours Americas wackiest homes on the real estate market, learning about the sellers and buyers who call these quirky abodes home.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack McBrayer tours Americas wackiest homes on the real estate market, learning about the sellers and buyers who call these quirky abodes home.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A New York high-flying creative wants to escape the city for an East Hampton dream home. She wants a glistening pool and the space to entertain.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: High-school sweethearts and their young family relocate to the breath-taking Emerald Isle. An oceanfront, open plan property is what theyre after!

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A lively family decide that that they want to swap city life for the sea views of Coronado Island. They want a beach front property for under $4million.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A family of six want to relocate to Avalon, located in the sunny hills of Catalina Island. They want a seafront home with timeless architectural style.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Izzy Battres works with his family to develop their own renovation business. They turn an Anaheim couples casita into the home of their dreams.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Izzy faces a tough renovation as a beach loving family needs help updating their new home after buying it sight unseen.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! programme.title: Tiny Luxury
programme.desc: Husband and wife Tyson and Michelle Spiess are founders of Tiny Heirloom, a unique building company focussing on the construction of tiny, luxury homes. In this reality series we follow them as they construct homes under 400 square feet (37 square metres) into glorious, high-end, miniature mansions, showing that downsizing doesnt have to compromise comfort and style. Based in Portland, Oregon, the family run company helps customers fulfill their real estate dreams, squeezing every wish and request into these tiny homes, allowing them to enjoy every aspect of their new, pint-sized properties.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Italiano
programme.desc: As opening day nears, Dave and Jenny go the extra mile to take on special projects to complete their friends centuries-old Italian villa.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Holmes Family Rescue
programme.desc: Mike, Sherry and Michael turn a familys misfortune around after an incompetent contractor left an unfinished home addition.

programme.title: Beach Around the World
programme.desc: House hunters explore properties on some of the dreamiest beaches around the globe. From a rustic retreat on a tropical island in Thailand to a luxurious seaside hideaway in Portugal, families turn oceanside getaways into their everyday dream homes.

programme.title: Beach Around the World
programme.desc: House hunters explore properties on some of the dreamiest beaches around the globe. From a rustic retreat on a tropical island in Thailand to a luxurious seaside hideaway in Portugal, families turn oceanside getaways into their everyday dream homes.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: The Antwerp Diamond Heist. An elite crew of Italian thieves targets the vault of the Antwerp World Diamond Centre. After 27 months of planning, they execute their intricate plan and make off with more than 100 million dollars.

programme.title: Original Gangsters with Sean Bean
programme.desc: Everyone knows the Peaky Blinders of Stephen Knights smash hit BBC drama, but far fewer know the reality the series was based on, the real-life men who terrorised Birmingham in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Why are humans so different from every other species on Earth? Did we evolve from apes or is our intelligence the result of contact with an otherworldly source?

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Shipwrecks, plane crashes, disappearances, and UFO sightings, oh my! This episode explores the Lake Michigan Triangle and many other wild and weird places, including a creepy doll-filled island, and caves that harbor deadly viruses.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: The Antwerp Diamond Heist. An elite crew of Italian thieves targets the vault of the Antwerp World Diamond Centre. After 27 months of planning, they execute their intricate plan and make off with more than 100 million dollars.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hoping to strike it rich in the Mill City, Minneapolis, Minnesota. While there, the guys have a brush with a happy little Bob Ross painting, tackle a jersey signed by the Minnesota Vikings Purple People Eaters.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: In 1698, Captain William Kidd raids a ship on the high seas and seizes its vast treasure... but Kidd is hanged before revealing where he stashed the loot. What happened to Captain Kidds lost booty... and where is it now?

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: When Andy and Paul head to Northern California to investigate one of Brandon Fugals most intriguing sites: the notorious energy hotspot of Mt. Shasta, they discover the outrageous lore surrounding the mountain is justified by hard data.
